name: Wagon_Wheel_Bakery
text:
Wagon Wheel Bakery
The Wagon Wheel Bakery was a bakery in Twin Peaks, Washington, located two blocks from the Twin Peaks Sheriff's Department.
The bakery was responsible for the majority of donuts consumed in the town and provided breakfasts at the Cozy Box Bed 'N Breakfast.
Behind the scenes
 
In a deleted scene from "Episode 1", Lucy Moran and Andy Brennan visit the similarly-named Wagon Wheel Do-Nuts to purchase donuts for the Sheriff's Department. 
This scene was shot at Monrovia Bakery in Monrovia, California.
